c1.name: Agate Ryuukin
c1.effect:
The Aurous Blaze created by **Ryuukin Saxifrage** lasts for an extra 4s.
Additionally, when an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated within its duration, Yoimiya's ATK is increased by 20% for 20s.

c2.name: A Procession of Bonfires
c2.effect:
When Yoimiya's Pyro DMG scores a CRIT Hit, Yoimiya will gain a 25% Pyro DMG Bonus for 6s.
This effect can be triggered even when Yoimiya is not the active character.

c3.name: Trickster's Flare
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Niwabi Fire-Dance** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Pyrotechnic Professional
c4.effect: When Yoimiya's own Aurous Blaze triggers an explosion, **Niwabi Fire-Dance**'s CD is decreased by 1.2s.

c5.name: A Summer Festival's Eve
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Ryuukin Saxifrage** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
c6.effect: During **Niwabi Fire-Dance**, Yoimiya's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance of firing an extra Kindling Arrow that deals 60% of its original DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.
